snippet: The Tar Heels avoid the unwanted history of being the first No. 1 seed to lose to a No. 16 seed in tournament history.
abstract: Providence defeats Southern California, 70-69, in first round of NCAA men's basketball tournament; other scores from East region noted.
lead_paragraph: The Tar Heels avoid the unwanted history of being the first No. 1 seed to lose to a No. 16 seed in tournament history.

headline.print_headline: Strong Second Half Helps North Carolina Beat Florida Gulf Coast
headline.main: Strong Second Half Helps North Carolina Beat Florida Gulf Coast
